title: EASY [Untapped] Kindle Keyword Research Method For Amazon Book Publishing

tactics.name: Amazon Search Suggestion Expander
tactics.description: Free browser extension to generate keyword ideas by expanding Amazon's auto-suggestions
steps: Install Amazon Search Suggestion Expander and KDP Niche Research extension
Browse Amazon and input seed keywords (e.g., 'how to')
Filter suggestions relevant to book topics
caveats: Some suggestions may have existing trademarks
source_quotes: you can use this searches to get ideas for your kindle publishing books

tactics.name: Keyword Filtering
tactics.description: Identify untapped keywords by filtering Amazon search results for books with low competition and high relevance.
steps: Build a keyword list using tools like Publisher Rocket
Analyze keywords by filtering books with BSR < 200,000 and review counts < 200
Avoid broad keywords like 'keto' by finding longer tail keywords (e.g., 'keto for weight loss women')
caveats: May fail if niche is overly saturated or lacks sufficient search volume
source_quotes: I like to keep the total results you can also see over here the total results I like to keep it about 1000 or lower

tactics.name: bsr_review_filter
tactics.description: filters books by bestseller rank and review count
steps: use publisher rocket to find books with low review counts
caveats: fails when niche is too competitive
source_quotes: ay tuned with your alexa and bye [Music]

heuristics.name: Low Review Filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: you can see that many of this keywords over here have nothing to do with books

heuristics.name: Review-BSR Correlation
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200 and BSR < 50,000, prioritize the keyword
source_quotes: I like to keep the best seller rank when it comes to the average below 200 000

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
source_quotes: ay tuned with your alexa and bye [Music]

claims.statement: Amazon's auto-suggestion tool provides real-time search data
source_quotes: these searches are appearing and you can use this searches to get ideas

claims.statement: This method identifies untapped keywords by avoiding broad terms and focusing on niche markets with lower competition
source_quotes: This is what i do this is the strategy that you can use it is a very effective strategy

claims.statement: KDP prioritizes books with high bestseller ranks and review counts
source_quotes: ay tuned with your alexa and bye [Music]

niche_patterns.description: Combines target audience, pain points, and specific criteria for niche markets
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets underserved audiences with lower competition
source_quotes: you want to publish your book on a topic that is profitable
